body_html: Hm, the fence approach came after a brief discussion with @zdevito about how to deal with the fact that adding world tokens to mutating ops directly would implicitly change their function schema. I think I misunderstood the prior design consensus though; I can put up a version of this where we pass the world token through the ops directly.

body: Hm, the fence approach came after a brief discussion with @zdevito about how to deal with the fact that adding world tokens to mutating ops directly would implicitly change their function schema. I think I misunderstood the prior design consensus though; I can put up a version of this where we pass the world token through the ops directly.
